steps.1: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan
steps.2: put-put tomatoes on a serving plate
steps.4: stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space
steps.5: crack-crack one egg in a bowl
steps.6: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour
steps.7: Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan
steps.8: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl
steps.9: Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes
steps.10: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan
steps.11: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette
steps.14: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl
steps.15: add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl
